activities: Indivior Inc. (Indivior)is a global pharmaceutical manufacturer with headquarters in Richmond, Virginia. Our parent company Indivior PLC is registered in England and Wales Since Indivior is a global pharmaceutical manufacturer, we may engage in pharmaceutical research (e.g., clinical trials, research, etc.) in which we may have data exchanges between EU to the US and Swiss to the US. These information exchanges occurs on an as-needed basis when we have pharmaceutical research in the impacted locations.
